short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Drive folders with Salesforce in minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Files Connect is the simplest way to connect Google Drive & Workspace files with Salesforce. Integrate Google, Docs, Sheets, Slides and Drive with Salesforce in minutes. There are 2 components to Files Connect. Files Connect is free for all users.

1 ➞ Google Chrome Extension (Google Chrome Store)
2 ➞ Native Salesforce Application (Salesforce AppExchange) - https://appexchange.salesforce.com/listingDetail?listingId=a0N4V00000GuL8nUAF

File Connect features include the following:

➞ Link Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Drive folder to any Salesforce record from your Chrome browser
➞ Access linked Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Drive folder from your Chrome browser
➞ Link Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Drive folders in Salesforce
➞ Create Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Drive folders in Salesforce
➞ View and Edit Google Docs, Sheets, Slides in Salesforce

For more information, please visit us at https://www.filesconnectapp.com/
